short_summary: Furnish all materials, labor, equipment, for the reconstruction of a wharf in Frenchman's Cove, NL.
description: See tender description, invitation to tender.
duration_in_months: Preliminary evaluation is completed. Evaluation phase will start on 2023-12-19. Expected duration is 114 weeks.
full_summary:
=================
### Tender Announcement

#### F6140-230739 - Wharf Reconstruction Phase 1 – Frenchman’s Cove, NL

**Reference Number:** WS4334550658-Doc4334563867
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** December 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** December 21, 2023, at 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** December 19, 2023

#### Contracting Entity

* **Department of/Ministère des:** Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)/Services publics et Approvisionnement Canada (SPAC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)/Ministère des Pêches et des Océans (MPO)
* **End User Address:** 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6, Canada

#### Tender Opportunity

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to undertake wharf reconstruction in Frenchman’s Cove, Newfoundland and Labrador, on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO). The scope of work includes furnishing all required plant, labour, equipment, and materials for the wharf reconstruction.

**Estimated Value:** $5,000,001 to $20,000,000
**Delivery Date:** 114 weeks after contract award
**Bid Security:** Required for the second phase of the tender

#### Notice URLs

* [English]: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18194109?extsite=MTgxOTQxMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* [French]:https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18194109?extsite=MTgxOTQxMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Contact Information

* **Name:** Alexandria Dwyer (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Newfoundland and Labrador
* **Expected Start/
